class.name: GraphNode
class.brief_description: A GraphNode is a container with several input and output slots allowing connections between GraphNodes. Slots can have different, incompatible types.
class.description: A GraphNode is a container defined by a title. It can have 1 or more input and output slots, which can be enabled (shown) or disabled (not shown) and have different (incompatible) types. Colors can also be assigned to slots. A tuple of input and output slots is defined for each GUI element included in the GraphNode. Input and output connections are left and right slots, but only enabled slots are counted as connections.

method.name: clear_all_slots
method.description: Disable all input and output slots of the GraphNode.

method.name: clear_slot
method.description: Disable input and output slot whose index is 'idx'.

method.name: get_connection_input_color
method.description: Return the color of the input connection 'idx'.

method.name: get_connection_input_count
method.description: Return the number of enabled input slots (connections) to the GraphNode.

method.name: get_connection_input_pos
method.description: Return the position of the input connection 'idx'.

method.name: get_connection_input_type
method.description: Return the type of the input connection 'idx'.

method.name: get_connection_output_color
method.description: Return the color of the output connection 'idx'.

method.name: get_connection_output_count
method.description: Return the number of enabled output slots (connections) of the GraphNode.

method.name: get_connection_output_pos
method.description: Return the position of the output connection 'idx'.

method.name: get_connection_output_type
method.description: Return the type of the output connection 'idx'.

method.name: get_offset
method.description: Return the offset of the GraphNode.

method.name: get_slot_color_left
method.description: Return the color set to 'idx' left (input) slot.

method.name: get_slot_color_right
method.description: Return the color set to 'idx' right (output) slot.

method.name: get_slot_type_left
method.description: Return the (integer) type of left (input) 'idx' slot.

method.name: get_slot_type_right
method.description: Return the (integer) type of right (output) 'idx' slot.

method.name: get_title
method.description: Return the title of the GraphNode.

method.name: is_close_button_visible
method.description: Returns true if the close button is shown. False otherwise.

method.name: is_slot_enabled_left
method.description: Return true if left (input) slot 'idx' is enabled. False otherwise.

method.name: is_slot_enabled_right
method.description: Return true if right (output) slot 'idx' is enabled. False otherwise.

method.name: set_offset
method.description: Set the offset of the GraphNode.

method.name: set_show_close_button
method.description: Show the close button on the GraphNode if 'show' is true (disabled by default). If enabled, a connection on the signal close_request is needed for the close button to work.

method.name: set_slot
method.description: Set the tuple of input/output slots defined by 'idx' ID. 'left' slots are input, 'right' are output. 'type' is an integer defining the type of the slot. Refer to description for the compatibility between slot types.

method.name: set_title
method.description: Set the title of the GraphNode.

signal.name: close_request
signal.description: Signal sent on closing the GraphNode.

signal.name: dragged
signal.description: Signal sent when the GraphNode is dragged.

signal.name: offset_changed
signal.description: Signal sent when the GraphNode is moved.

signal.name: raise_request
signal.description: Signal sent when the GraphNode is requested to be displayed over other ones. Happens on focusing (clicking into) the GraphNode.
